Autosave
The Volcanic Curse
In the beginning, there were three girls born on a volcanic
island. They were blessed by the goddess to be given
life. As they grew, two of the girls became close to
each other, isolating the third one. They started
beating on the third until she became paranoid
and helpless. After tireless bullying, the third
killed both out of a fit of rage and yelled at the
skies her demonic screams. The island became a
volcano, an isolated place where no one dared to
venture many years later. There is a legend that
whoever comes across the volcanic island will be
cursed to kill their family and their generations
to come.
People5
Lacie: This story is sad. Why do the sisters have
to bully their other sister?
People5
Maybe… they don’t like her?
People5
Lacie: It’s obvious, but I wonder why?
Flower Evermore
Every thousand years, a beautiful flower will bloom
on a full moon. The moment of blooms will only last
but a minute. Those who managed to pluck the flower
during the peak of a full bloom, the flower will
crystallize and retain its shape forever. If the
flower is kept, it will grant the person a prosperous
life. Losing this flower as well will give you a
disastrous life. The flower's entire existence brings
great calamity and to erase its existence, you must
bury it and have a vampire pray to it.
Silvain praying to Flower (Reyen's Scribbles)
People5
Lacie: Did you draw this?
People5

People5
Lacie: What a waste of a book, but at least you
have a creative mind.
Legend of St. Jean Jacques
In a kingdom far far away, there lived Jean Jacques,
the kingdom’s most popular advisor to the king. Many
people revered him as a Saint because all his deeds
were done for the people and the king. To Jean
Jacques, his loyalty to the king was everything
and with the king, he could accomplish a would
without pain and suffering. No one would ever expect
the death of a saint… until a war broke out
against a radical group calling for a council
system and St. Jean Jacques was poisoned to death
by the enemy. At the end of the story, the corrupted
council was established, and the corruption will
continue with their children.
People5
Lacie: Do you think this cycle of hate will ever end?
People5
No. I don’t think so.
People5
Lacie: I hope there will be another St. Jean Jacques
that will save everyone from this corrupted council.
Grimm Adventures
A children’s book depicting of two main characters:
Huginn and Muninn. Huginn and Muninn have a boss
named the Grimm Reaper, who was ill to do his job.
Instead, the Plague Doctor took control and asked
of Huginn and Muninn to collect souls for him.
Huginn and Muninn humbly accept and the two
adventure off collecting souls for the Plague Doctor.
People5
I remember reading this a long time ago.
Lacie, you weren’t here, but father
would read this to me when I was a lot
younger.
People5
Lacie: What happened to your father?
People5
He left one day and never came back.
People5
Lacie: Aw. Maybe we’ll find him again.
Dragonic Planet
According to a Constellation Mage of the
Gertrude Royalty, it is said that a planet far away
from our galaxy isn’t a planet but a planet-sized
dragon. This dragon was sealed away by the gods
after a war and life formed on its back. There
lived many races in disharmony. Eventually there
is to be a dragon’s awakening that will lead to
mass destruction.
People5
Lacie: Now where would a constellation mage find
all the time to discover another planet in a
faraway galaxy?
People5
Discoveries?
People5
Lacie: This is not worth it.
People5
At least it gives an idea that we're
not alone in the universe.
Robot with a Heart
A scientist created a humanoid robot to raise
as their child. This robot doesn’t understand the
meaning of life nor what it means to have a heart.
It enjoyed the days alongside its parent until the
parent died of old age under a willow tree. It was
the day the robot felt emotions and cried out into
the sky for its parent. Overwhelmed by emotions,
it shut down under the willow tree.
People5
Lacie: Poor robot.
